mapper.select: SELECT sh.shipid, sh.shipdate1, sh.shipcode, sh.workcode, sh.stockid, st.stockquantity, sh.itemname, sh.clientname, sh.pocnt, sh.shipsts, sh.shipdate2, sh.membercode FROM ship sh LEFT JOIN stock st ON sh.stockid = st.stockid ORDER BY shipdate1 DESC, shipid DESC;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ship (shipdate1, shipcode, workcode, itemname, clientname, pocnt, shipsts, membercode) VALUES ( #{shipdate1}, #{shipcode}, #{workcode}, #{itemname}, #{clientname}, #{pocnt}, #{shipsts}, #{membercode} )
mapper.select: SELECT wk.workcode, wk.clientname, wk.itemname, wk.pocnt, wk.workdate1 FROM work wk

select count(*) from ship
and shipcode like 'SH%';

SELECT sh.shipid, sh.shipdate1, sh.shipcode, sh.workcode, sh.stockid, st.stockquantity, sh.itemname, sh.lotnumber, sh.clientname, sh.pocnt, sh.shipsts, sh.shipdate2, sh.membercode FROM ship sh LEFT JOIN stock st ON sh.stockid = st.stockid WHERE clientname LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR itemname LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR shipcode LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' ORDER BY shipdate1 DESC, shipid DESC;

SELECT wk.workid, wk.workdate1, wk.workcode, wk.clientname, wk.pocode, wk.itemname, wk.worksts, wk.pocnt, wk.workupdate, wk.workdate2, wk.membercode FROM work wk LEFT JOIN purchaseorder po ON wk.pocode = po.pocode GROUP BY wk.workid, wk.workdate1, wk.workcode, wk.pocode, wk.itemname, wk.worksts, wk.pocnt, wk.workupdate, wk.workdate2, wk.membercode ORDER BY workdate1 DESC, workid DESC;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO work (workdate1, workcode, pocode, clientname, itemname, worksts, membercode, pocnt) VALUES ( #{workdate1}, #{workcode}, #{pocode}, #{clientname}, #{itemname}, #{worksts}, #{membercode}, #{pocnt} )
mapper.select: SELECT po.pocode, po.clientid, cli.clientname, po.itemid, it.itemname, po.pocnt FROM purchaseorder po JOIN client cli ON po.clientid = cli.clientid JOIN item it ON po.itemid = it.itemid;

select count(*) from work
and workcode like 'WK%';
